item.description:
What do ski areas do in the summer??  They TIKI.............

In Winter you can Ski and Tube at Nashoba but come summer, Nashoba turns into a paradise Tiki Bar on the water of the Ski area.

On Thursday nights, the Tiki Bar becomes a good ole New England style clambake, complete with live music after dinner.  So come on out, grab an Adirondac Chair, have some steamers and lobster and enjoy the music.

Every Thursday Evening from 6:00pm to 9:00pm, on the Waterfront at Nashoba Valley Ski Area. For just $29.95 you will get a 1¼ pound lobster, with unlimited steamers, New England clam chowder, corn on the cob, assorted salads, apple pie, and blueberry pie. (one lobster per person)

A steak option is available as an alternative for those who don't want lobster.

WE WILL NEED TO MAKE ADVANCE RESERVATIONS FOR THIS EVENT, AT THIS TIME WE ARE NOT SURE IF WE NEED TO PAY IN ADVANCE OR NOT SO PLEASE ONLY SERIOUS RSVPS ONLY.  ONCE YOU HAVE RSVP'D FOR THE EVENT, WE WILL SEND UPDATES TO THOSE WHO HAVE RSVP'D YES.

This is a rain or shine event.  Large event tents are put up around the tiki bar to ensure everyone will remain dry.

Please keep in mind that if you are planning on attending, have RSVP'd Yes and are running late or get lost, please call the meetup cellphone at 978-304-2811 and let us know. 

If you have not paid your dues this year, please consider paying them at this event.  If you are unsure if you owe dues, please see the section under your profile picture for your last recorded payment.  If you are still having trouble finding the information please speak to an organizer.

 

We hope to see you at the Tiki

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Proceed to the Tiki Bar and ask for our group
item.name: Lobsterfest @ Nashoba Valley
